column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=We had finally earned enough points to travel to Portland .
#text=Husband bought the tickets a few months before our trip .
#text=As the date of departure neared , I began to prepare for the flight and trip .
#text=I packed our clothes and planned things to do .
#text=His parents drove us to the fly away and we took a bus from there to the airport .
#text=We walked up to the airline counter and checked in for the flight .
#text=We decided to carry our luggage on , since it was n't over sized .
#text=The lady gave us our boarding passes and we walked over to the line to get through the security checkpoint .
#text=The line was pretty short , so we made it to the front rather quickly .
#text=We took off our shoes , husband took off his belt , and we placed our luggage on the x-ray belt .
#text=He emptied his pockets and we walked through the metal detector .
#text=Everything went without a hitch and we grabbed our belongings and put our shoes back on .
#text=We walked to our gate and soon they called for boarding .
#text=We walked out the door , onto the tarmac , up the stairs to the airplane , into the airplane , put our baggage up in the compartments , and took our seats .
#text=We held hands as they went over the safety protocol and the plane taxied to take off .
#text=When it took off , I closed my eyes and soon we were soaring in the air .
#text=We flew over for a few hours and then had a gentle landing .
#text=We deplaned and walked into the terminal .
